=== Process ===
Please follow the instructions below in order to officially become an Ubuntu Youth member!

{*} Read the introduction on the UbuntuYouth homepage and the other pages included in the header section, this will help you to get a grasp of what the group is about and (more importantly) whether it is right for you!

{*} Subscribe to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/+me/+editemails|mailing list]]</nowiki>, this will keep you up to date with the groups activity and meetings.

{*} Come down to the #ubuntu-youth IRC channel on freenode!

=== Requirements ===
The following requirements must be met in order to become a member of the Ubuntu Youth team.

{*} You are young, and love to use Ubuntu/Linux, we are an open team and encourage all to join!
